title: Creating a reading list on multimodal entailment and semantic alignment involves selecting articles that cover foundational theories, methodologies, and recent advancements in the field. Here’s a list of 20 articles up to 2021 that you might find useful
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** by Hao-Ting Chang et al
- This survey provides a comprehensive overview of multimodal machine learning, including semantic alignment
**"Aligning Books and Movies: Towards Story-like Visual Explanations by Watching Movies and Reading Books"** by Yukun Zhu et al
- Discusses aligning textual and visual narratives
**"Deep Multimodal Semantic Embeddings for Speech and Images"** by Hassan Akbari et al
- Explores semantic embeddings across speech and image modalities
**"Visual Semantic Role Labeling: A Benchmark for Image and Video Scene Understanding"** by Ranjay Krishna et al
- Focuses on semantic role labeling in visual contexts
**"Learning Deep Representations for Grounding Natural Language with Visual Attributes"** by Vicente Ordonez et al
- Discusses grounding language in visual attributes
- Early work on integrating visual and textual data in language models
Grounded Question Answering in Images"** by Yuke Zhu et al
- Introduces a dataset and model for visual question answering
Visual Question Answering"** by Aishwarya Agrawal et al
- A seminal paper on visual question answering, a key area in multimodal understanding
**"Image-Text Embeddings for Large-Scale Zero-Shot Learning"** by Scott Reed et al
- Discusses embeddings for aligning image and text data
**"Deep Visual-Semantic Alignments for Generating Image Descriptions"** by Andrej Karpathy and Li Fei-Fei
- Explores generating textual descriptions from images
**"Unifying Visual-Semantic Embeddings with Multimodal Neural Language Models"** by Ryan Kiros et al
- Discusses unifying visual and semantic embeddings
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"** by Soujanya Poria et al
- Covers sentiment analysis across multiple modalities
**"Aligning Visual Regions and Textual Concepts for Semantic-Grounded Image Representations"** by Junhua Mao et al
note: - Focuses on aligning visual and textual data.

title: **"Multimodal Deep Learning"** by Ngiam Jiquan et al
- One of the early works on deep learning for multimodal data
**"Learning to Compose Neural Networks for Question Answering"** by Jacob Andreas et al
- Discusses compositional models for multimodal question answering
Attend and Tell: Neural Image Caption Generation with Visual Attention"** by Kelvin Xu et al
- Introduces attention mechanisms for image captioning
**"Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"** by Tadas Baltrušaitis et al
- A survey on multimodal representation learning techniques
- Discusses cross-modal scene understanding
**"Zero-Shot Learning Through Cross-Modal Transfer"** by Richard Socher et al
- Explores zero-shot learning using cross-modal data
**"Multimodal Fusion for Video Search Reranking"** by Chong-Wah Ngo et al
- Discusses multimodal fusion techniques for video search

These articles cover a range of topics from foundational theories to specific applications in multimodal entailment and semantic alignment. They should provide a solid foundation for understanding the field and its developments up to
